name: War Of Gods
detailed_description: Our team has reconstructed the atmosphere of the classic 2D turn-based strategy, so long ago attracting fans of such masterpieces as Heroes of Might and Magic and Disciples. We  made the game with instinctively clear interface and original graphics, and modern mechanics allowed to fill the project with an unforgettable spirit of MMO-games with all the fullness social interaction. You will be offered  clan wars and conquests of castles, campaigns on RAID- bosses and battle arenas. And only a violent confrontation will decide whose clan is worthy to own lands  Between Worlds. We also added a number of classic RPG-mechanics to the game, providing players the opportunity to compete, to teach, to wear, to pierce, both its character  and the whole army . Hiking in the vast land, does not seem an easy walk, only the right choice of strategy and well-developed tactics will help to achieve this goal.

short_description: WoG – 2d turn-based strategy with RPG elements. Gather a team of loyal followers, build a domain, explore the land of the Interworld, explore dungeons, fight hordes of enemies reveal the secret of appearance in this world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 400
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

release_date.date: March 1 the deadline for the start of the full version of the game
